name: So I Finally Flew Porter...
description:
Over the years, I've tried to fly as many of Canada's airlines as I can, and one that I'd always been meaning to get around is Toronto's Porter Airlines.

In February of 2022, I finally tried them out on a flight from Toronto/Billy Bishop to Ottawa... What was it like?

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: Porter Airlines (POE/PD)
Aircraft: De Havilland Canada Dash 8-400 (DH8D)
Flight Number: PD207
Seat: 3A
Livery: Standard
Engines: 2x Pratt and Whitney Canada PW150A
Registration: C-GLQK
Route: Toronto/Billy Bishop (YTZ) - Ottawa (YOW)
Callsign: PORTER 207
Runway used: 08 (YTZ) - 07 (YOW)
Date filmed: February 2022

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Outro song - "Take Flight" by Nyhtian: https://youtu.be/bCTTwQ_269c
